title: iboss - Web and DLP Events
description: This dashboard provides insights into iboss web activity and DLP events, helping track user access and data protection actions.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides insights into iboss web activity and DLP events, helping track user access and data protection actions.

For more information, see the [iboss Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/iboss/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.
